content: विभूतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Mighty, power, greatness; <ls>Śi. 14. 5</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 61.</ls> {@--2@} Prosperity, welfare. {@--3@} Dignity, exalted rank. {@--4@} Riches, plenty, magnificence, splendour; अहो राजाधिराजमंत्रिणो विभूतिः <ls>Mu. 3</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 36.</ls> {@--5@} Wealth, riches; <ls>R. 4. 19</ls>, <ls n="R.">6. 76</ls>, <ls n="R.">17. 43.</ls> {@--6@} Superhuman power (which consists of eight faculties, अणिमन्, लघिमन्, प्राप्ति, प्राकाम्य, महिमन्, रिशिता, वशिता and कामावसायिता); <ls>Ku. 2. 11.</ls> {@--7@} Ashes of cow-dung.
